definitions.title: Pi‘lel
definitions.body: be comely, befitting (Thes Ol:§ 251 a, 187 a Sta:§ 416 b Ges:§. 2. R. 4 SS Bae:Ps 33:1 > AE Ki Hartm:Plurilit.-bildungen (1875) 13 ff. Nö:ZMG xxx. 1876, 185 Now Hup:Ps 31:1, Ps 93:5 Buhl

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: √ I. [[אוה]] desire, i.e. desirable, beautiful; NH [[נאה]] Pi. Hithp.; Targum [[נוֹאִי]] beauty);—

definitions.title: Piïlel
definitions.body: Pf. [[נַאֲוׇה]] Ps 93:5 (so van d. H Ginsb; Mass Baer De:ad loc. [[נָֽאֲוָה]] = [[נׇאוָה]] v. [[נׇאוֶה]]

definitions.title: adj.,
definitions.body: but v. Sta:§ 155. b. n); [[נׇאווּ]] Is 52:7, Ct So 1:10 (on form cf. Ges:l. c.);—
be comely; of feet of messenger, (fig.) Is 52:7; of cheeks Ct So 1:10.
